title: i am so disappointed in riot right now
body:
seriously...why is lux getting ANOTHER SKIN. xayah and rakan get a skin before aurelion sol? seriously fuck you riot. 
i literally made a comment on someone else post where they were hoping sol nasus ans ww got the skins, and i commented "nope more skins for ahri annie and lux" as a joke and low and behold lux did get the skin over sol. riot your skin team is truly disappointing...i was so excited to see one of my favorite skin lines on my favorite champion...

i actually feel like crying right now because i was so excited but this is absolutely ridiculous.
